channel.title: BMS steam chat moments
channel.description:
So this is just a thread to post some particularly good moments from the BMS steam chat. Just stick quote marks around it, and place it in here! :wink: [quote] Soup: so, Tman, what's your boyfriend like? Tman545: transvestite [/quote]
[quote] Lamsey: he's further away, so i have to use my cock to be able to reach [SassySanFROD] - All about tf2: *have to rub and rub and rub! [/quote]
[quote] Soup is spinning like a walrus [SassySanFROD] - All about tf2 spins right round, baby, right round, like a walrus baby [SJ!] Keresh: there you go Soup: ... in the SPIN chamberrr ~Siggers: get away from the walrus gordon! Its not shutting down! [SassySanFROD] - All about tf2: haha! ~Siggers: oh god! Soup: shutting down... [EG] mini_bunney: wAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH [SassySanFROD] - All about tf2: attempting walrus tifflers: GORDAN FREEMAn at last. Lamsey: spinning down... attempting spindown... it's not spinning down! ~Siggers: attempting shutdown Soup: attempting shut down Soup: it's not... it's not shutting down! ~Siggers: its not shutting down! [SassySanFROD] - All about tf2: haah! Lamsey wins. ~Siggers: ninja'd all the way tifflers: :] Soup: I think we just made a HL canon Lamsey: walrus cannon? ~Siggers: sweet [SassySanFROD] - All about tf2: A walrus cannon VikVega entered chat. [SassySanFROD] - All about tf2: Indeed Soup: move over, Pachabel tifflers: :slight_smile: [SJ!] Keresh: big wlarus canon Lamsey: secondary fire spins it for extra power? [SJ!] Keresh: wlarus Lamsey: or pressure >_> [SJ!] Keresh: wat [SassySanFROD] - All about tf2: WALRUS CANNON... FIRE! Soup: NOT CANNON Soup: NOT Soup: NOT ~Siggers: like a tau cannon, but it fires watery walrus particles instead? Soup: haha [SassySanFROD] - All about tf2: hahaha! Soup: nice one, Siggs [EG] mini_bunney: walruscannon jump would be cool in multiplayer ~Siggers: I want that weapon! [SJ!] Keresh: spinning particles Soup: Walruses would probably bounce [SJ!] Keresh: but watery [SJ!] Keresh: yes Soup: and make walls glow [/quote]
[quote] Lamsey: Paedo has an 'A' in it. AN 'A'!!! [/quote] So yeah, when you see something worth of keeping, slap it in here! :freeman:

item.title: BMS steam chat moments
item.dc:creator: Triage
item.description:
Nick: Supn
Nick: I heard that the Mars rover landed safely.
Nick: Hooray for America
Triggs: hooray for fucking everyone
Triggs: isn’t it just an amazing thing
Triggs: that people built something then exploded things and threw it to mars
Nick: Almost as amazing as a Black Mesa cartoon series.
Triggs: no that would be dumb
Gom Lanbar disconnected.
Triggs: somebody tried that once and it was the most abhorrent pile of shit.
Nick: I know.
Nick: Using GoAnimate,
Triggs: yeah
Triggs: which is totally a professional tool.
Triggs: and not at all a terrible scar on the internet
G-Rona: Yeah, that’d be a shame
samzala disconnected.
Nick: Too bad it was an amazing cartoon.
Nick: 10/10 would watch again.
Triggs: but it wasn’t
Triggs: it wasn’t sbahj bad
Triggs: it was bad bad.
Triggs: and then he tried to turn that into a feature?
Triggs: I can see that as a box quote
G-Rona: It wasn’t even “So bad it’s good” bad.
G-Rona: Just bad.
Triggs: “buy our game, it’s shit”
Nick: Yes it was. It was amazing. Nobody can compare to Triage’s masterful mind of comedy.
Triggs: or the other guy i can’t remember the name of
Nick: You yourself compared him to Seth MacFarlane
Triggs: yes
Nick: So in other words he’s a comedy mastermind.
Triggs: as a joke
Triggs: because seth macfarlane isn’t a comedy mastermind
Nick: Jokes don’t exist. Just like God.
Triggs: I can’t quite nail down why seth macfarlane is bad.
Nick: He’s amazing, just like Triage.
Triggs: yeah clearly
Nicholas Anthony: Nick: Supn
Nick: I heard that the Mars rover landed safely.
Nick: Hooray for America
Triggs: hooray for fucking everyone
Triggs: isn’t it just an amazing thing
Triggs: that people built something then exploded things and threw it to mars
Nick: Almost as amazing as a Black Mesa cartoon series.
Triggs: no that would be dumb
Gom Lanbar disconnected.
Triggs: somebody tried that once and it was the most abhorrent pile of shit.
Nick: I know.
Nick: Using GoAnimate,
Triggs: yeah
Triggs: which is totally a professional tool.
Triggs: and not at all a terrible scar on the internet
G-Rona: Yeah, that’d be a shame
samzala disconnected.
Nick: Too bad it was an amazing cartoon.
Nick: 10/10 would watch again.
Triggs: but it wasn’t
Triggs: it wasn’t sbahj bad
Triggs: it was bad bad.
Triggs: and then he tried to turn that into a feature?
Triggs: I can see that as a box quote
G-Rona: It wasn’t even “So bad it’s good” bad.
G-Rona: Just bad.
Triggs: “buy our game, it’s shit”
Nick: Yes it was. It was amazing. Nobody can compare to Triage’s masterful mind of comedy.
Triggs: or the other guy i can’t remember the name of
Nick: You yourself compared him to Seth MacFarlane
Triggs: yes
Nick: So in other words he’s a comedy mastermind.
Triggs: as a joke
Triggs: because seth macfarlane isn’t a comedy mastermind
Nick: Jokes don’t exist. Just like God.
Triggs: I can’t quite nail down why seth macfarlane is bad.
Nick: He’s amazing, just like Triage.
Triggs: yeah clearly
Nick: Now Maxey’s cartoon
Triggs: though
Nick: that was horrible
Triggs: the true unsung hero here is definitely maxey.
Triggs: because his shit was god tier
Nick: His shit was shit.
Nick: The conclusion of this is that Triage is a comedy god among men.
[TCHS] schlürbi entered chat.
[TCHS] schlürbi: Yo
G-Rona: Yo
Nick: Yo
[TCHS] schlürbi: New ME3 Operation. Called Olympus
Nick: We were just talking about how god like Triage is.
Maxey entered chat.
Maxey: https://store.steampowered.com/news/8584/
Maxey: can’t wait to play Photoshop with Steam Achievements
Triggs: :0
Triggs:
Nick: MAXEY
Nick: YOUR CARTTON WAS SHIT
Nick: TRIAGE’S WAS MUCH BETTER
Maxey: who the fuck is this guy
[TCHS] schlürbi: Don’t ask me
G-Rona: I can’t wait for fake BM pages on Greenlight.
Triggs: somebody who is terrible at sarcasm
Triggs: he doesn’t seem to understand the subtleties you need when using sarcasm in text
Triggs: either that
Triggs: or a fucking retard

Read full topic

item.title: BMS steam chat moments
item.dc:creator: Lamsey
item.description:
19:49 - [SanFROD]: you can tell a guy is gay if he’s clean
19:49 - [SanFROD]: /handsome
19:49 - [SanFROD]: /kawaii
19:50 - Lamsey: 100% gay reading for siggers then
19:50 - Lamsey: (simultaneous glowing praise and stab-in-the-back insult, awyeah)
19:51 - [SanFROD]: he is legit homosecks
19:51 - [SanFROD]: my gaydar went off when i met him
19:51 - [SanFROD]: also he was all “i like dicks in and around my mouth”
19:52 - [SanFROD]: that was a clue
19:52 - Lamsey: mine sounds like a geiger counter whenever i’m around him

Because slagging someone off behind their back isn’t nearly as fun as slagging someone off behind their back and then posting it on the internets so they can feel the burn afterwards.

Read full topic

item.title: BMS steam chat moments
item.dc:creator: Gom_Jabbar
item.description:
Ok edited slightly so it makes sense for those that cant speak Gomish and so it flows a little better:

Gom Jabbar: buy tasty crap, go to a park
Gom Jabbar: buy one of those annoying couples
Gom Jabbar: *be
Elpants®: No
Elpants®: Buy one
Elpants®: they are yours for the day
[NWI]Spence entered chat.
Elpants®: At your command
Gom Jabbar: why would anyone want that service
Gom Jabbar: YO SPENCE
[NWI]Spence: yo gom
Elpants®: I don’t know Gom
[NWI]Spence: just installed a new router and now my internet is on crack
[NWI]Spence: 62mbps down o.O
Gom Jabbar: emotional masochists maybe pants
Elpants®: But the idea of someone buying an annoying couple was really funny in my head
Gom Jabbar: yeah, it is quite funny
Gom Jabbar: that and hire a mother that never shuts up about her child
Elpants®: “I need you to be annoying as possible near that family having their reunion.”
Gom Jabbar: haha
[NWI]Spence: I would do it
Elpants®: BY GOD I WILL GET $50/HOUR OF ANNOYING OUT OF YOU
[NWI]Spence: actually
[NWI]Spence: someone should start a service for that
Gom Jabbar: fuck I think there’s a business for that
[NWI]Spence: provide annoying people for a fee
[NWI]Spence: there needs to be if there isn’t
[NWI]Spence: I mean seriously what better job
[NWI]Spence: get paid to be annoying and piss people off for the gain of others
[NWI]Spence: brilliant
[SanFROD]: man i’d do it
Gom Jabbar: we could make some srys money
[NWI]Spence: totally, me too
Gom Jabbar: KICKSTARTER
[NWI]Spence: internet, fund it
Elpants®: KICKSTARTER
Elpants®: That’s what all the cool kids are doing nowadays isnt it?
[NWI]Spence: all the broke cool kids
Gom Jabbar: for 50 dollars Gom will stand across the road drinking own brand lager and shouting laud remarks
Elpants®: You pledge $50, I will personally annoy your for 2 hours
Elpants®: $100, I will be drunk
Elpants®: (You buy the beer)
Elpants®: Nothing is more annoying that someone drinking your beer and being annoying
Gom Jabbar: no, (add extra for beer )
[NWI]Spence: someone streaking down your block with your beer in tow and being annoying
[NWI]Spence: now that’s the $1000 goal
[NWI]Spence:
Gom Jabbar: $ 100 mock Westoro baptist protest
Gom Jabbar: with personalized signage
Elpants®: $10,000 the REAL Westboro Baptist will protest your funeral
[NWI]Spence: lol
Gom Jabbar: why doesn’t this exist
[SanFROD]: hahahah oh god
[SanFROD]: hire a supermodel to attend your wedding and hit on the groom during the ceremony
[NWI]Spence: haha
Gom Jabbar: for $ 15,000 will fill house with parrots that constantly say " No body loves you" bird shit free of charge
[SanFROD]: oh god
[SanFROD]: hahha
[NWI]Spence: squaaaaawk
[NWI]Spence: forever alone
[NWI]Spence: SQUAAAWK

Read full topic

item.title: BMS steam chat moments
item.dc:creator: Lamsey
item.description:
I have observed a worrying trend in chat, so I have removed everyone else’s messages for this evening and focused on the ramblings of one specific individual. It makes for an interesting monologue.

Süggestive entered chat.
19:55 - Süggestive: IMMIGRANTS
19:57 - Süggestive tenses
19:57 - Süggestive: HAAAARDcire?
19:58 - Süggestive: fuck whty can’t i open anything

19:59 - Süggestive: want

19:59 - Süggestive: it has cherrie
20:00 - Süggestive: yes
20:00 - Süggestive: plural
20:00 - Süggestive: of cherry

20:00 - Süggestive: i haven’t eaten them yet
20:00 - Süggestive: fuck yes cherry
20:01 - Süggestive: they are best
20:01 - Süggestive: no
20:01 - Süggestive: wait
20:01 - Süggestive: mango
20:01 - Süggestive: is best

item.title: BMS steam chat moments
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Storytime with Triggs!

(rot)(fodder): anyways, that’s my weird little personal lifebite tossed out to the internet for today
(rot)(fodder): triggs
(rot)(fodder): your turn
Triggs: thinkan
Collision is now playing Dota 2. Click here to join.
100% Dan*: think faster
100% Dan*: dont give me a wall of text
100% Dan*: I dont want to read
(rot)(fodder): just write it out with emotes
(rot)(fodder): GIVE US PICTURES TRIGGS
Triggs: I’m not even
Triggs: i don’t
Triggs: I DON’T KNOW
(rot)(fodder): So what you are saying is
(rot)(fodder): you have no life?
(rot)(fodder): none
(rot)(fodder): as in
(rot)(fodder): no beginning
(rot)(fodder): you just appeared in the internet one day
(rot)(fodder): that’s cool though
(rot)(fodder): tell us a black mesa story
(rot)(fodder) waits and stares
Triggs: ok
Triggs: so there was this guy right
Triggs: i forget his name
100% Dan*: No Gordon. You are the monsters. And then gordan was a zombie
(rot)(fodder): oh this is going to be good
Triggs: something like
Triggs: adridon shepman
Triggs: or something
Triggs: i don’t know
(rot)(fodder): and what did he do
Triggs: gordian freehard?
Triggs: he did something
Triggs: and said some stuff
(rot)(fodder): frohan geeman
Triggs: and killed some aliens or something
Triggs: with science
(rot)(fodder): were there giant babies
Triggs: only one
(rot)(fodder) hides under pillow
(rot)(fodder): this is terifying
(rot)(fodder): what did it do
Triggs: it
Triggs: said things
(rot)(fodder) gasp
(rot)(fodder): scarry things?
Triggs: as gordian shepman went around doing science
Triggs: it told him about stuff
Triggs: stuff adridan didn’t really care about
(rot)(fodder): haha
(rot)(fodder): one second we lost dan
(rot)(fodder): DAN
(rot)(fodder): DID YOU FALL ASLEEP
Triggs: I’m pretty sure
Triggs: he’s in tears
(rot)(fodder): oh
Triggs: over the beautiful heartwarming story
Triggs: that i’m telling here
(rot)(fodder): that would explain the sobbing then
(rot)(fodder): please continue
Triggs: so adridan frehard
Triggs: went around doing his sciene
Triggs: around the giant babby
Triggs: then
(rot)(fodder): then?
Triggs: the giant babby teleportled gordian
(rot)(fodder): THEN!?
(rot)(fodder):
Triggs: and sent him to that god damn room with the 3 fucking
Triggs: what were they
Triggs: floating ball things?
Triggs: that moved around
Triggs: and you had to jump on one and ride it up?
Triggs: yeah
Triggs: he was there
Triggs: and then he died there
Triggs: because that part was infuriating.

Read full topic

item.title: BMS steam chat moments
item.dc:creator: NetWarriorDan
item.description:
Banana entered chat.
2:17 PM - Banana: Hey
2:17 PM - Banana: sO
2:17 PM - Banana: When does this come out
2:17 PM - Comrade Badger: when it’s done
2:17 PM - Banana: Are they making like one texture per week or something?
2:18 PM - [SanFROD]: yes
2:18 PM - [SanFROD]: that’s exactly how they’re doing it
2:18 PM - [SanFROD]: must have been obvious
2:24 PM - 100% Dan: lets see
2:24 PM - 100% Dan: we about 9013 vmts
2:24 PM - 100% Dan: thats textures and normals
2:25 PM - 100% Dan: buts lets assume each one is a texture
2:25 PM - [SanFROD]: so one a day
2:25 PM - [SanFROD]: hahaa
2:25 PM - 100% Dan: times 7 days
2:25 PM - 100% Dan: 63091 days
2:25 PM - 100% Dan: devided by 365 days
2:25 PM - 100% Dan: I’m not counting leap years
2:25 PM - 100% Dan: 172 years
2:25 PM - [SanFROD]: hahaha
2:26 PM - [SanFROD]: so black mesa will be out in… 165 years
2:26 PM - Comrade Badger: we’ve a long road ahead of us

Read full topic
